Methods

BindToColor(Fill, Action<Fill>)

Subscribes specified handler to ColorChanged event and calls immediately this handlers to simulate property change

public static void BindToColor(this Fill fill, Action<Fill> colorChangedHandler)

Parameters

fill Fill
colorChangedHandler Action<Fill>

Examples

The code below subscribes a specified lambda expression to ColorChanged and immediately calls it

Fill.BindToColor(brush => MyBrush = brush);

Remarks

This is a helper method, that is used to subscribe the event and to make some initialization at the same time
